resources.string: This exposure time is likely to still show star trails. Try using a shorter lens or increasing the aperture.
The EV is too high, this will result in underexposed images. Aim for -8 EV when shooting astrophotography. Try using a shorter focal length, a wider aperture, or increasing the ISO.
The EV is too low, this will result in overexposed images. Aim for -8 EV when shooting astrophotography. Try using a longer focal length, a narrower aperture, or decreasing the ISO.
